web/public/locales/.description: Translation files stored in web/public/locales/{lang}/translation.json format. English (en) and Spanish (es) locales created with nested JSON keys organized by feature/domain (common, navigation, dashboard, machines, serverless, jobs, models, finetuning, gpuMetrics, documentation, settings, auth, errors, emptyState, languages). i18n config in web/src/i18n.js loads from /locales/{{lng}}/translation.json path.

requirements.txt.description: Added Internationalization section with Flask-Babel>=4.0.0 and Babel>=2.14.0 for Python i18n support

cli/messages.pot.description: POT template file containing 190+ translatable strings extracted from all CLI Python files. Generated with: python3 -m babel.messages.frontend extract -F cli/babel.cfg -o cli/messages.pot cli/

src/templates/marketing_doc.html.description: Live Docs HTML template with 17 translatable strings wrapped using {{ _() }} syntax. Includes both static HTML content and JavaScript strings that are rendered server-side before serving to client.
